On Oct 6, 2007, at 2:54 AM, psyphiroth.nebu wrote:

> My question is that in what
> method can I achieve minimum error fitting?
> Thanks for help, I am a new guy.

Have you tried using root mean square error[1] as your fitness?

[1]: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mean_squared_error
--
Stephen Waits
steve@...
http://swaits.com/



--Apple-Mail-5-773218348
